sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"拒绝"之意。
means: refuse ： 语气较重，指态度坚决，肯定无疑的拒绝。
decline ： 指婉言谢绝他人的帮助或邀请等。
reject ： 多指由于某物某事某行为不能让人满意而被当面直截了当地拒绝。
repel ： 作"拒绝"解时，语气比reject强。
deny ： 指坚决地拒绝接受、给予或承认。

word_mean: 曾称“矸子”、“碴石”、“洗矸”。煤炭生产过程中产生的岩石统称。包括混入煤中的岩石、巷道掘进排出的岩石、采空区中垮落的岩石、工作面冒落的岩石以及选煤过程中排出的碳质岩等。

sentence.Network_en: The District Council made a weekly collection of refuse.
sentence.Network_cn: 区政务委员会每周收取一次垃圾。

sentence.Network_en: I've always had a loud mouth, I refuse to be silenced.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一贯大声说出自己的想法，不会迫于压力而一言不发。

sentence.Network_en: I refuse to act that way when my kids fight.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的孩子们打起架来时，我不会那样做。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...政治人物，该词的出现已经有好几年了，一般指萨拉·佩林口中的那些生拼硬凑的自创词，比如2010年她把“拒绝（refuse）”和“驳回（repudiate）”两词混在一起就成了“拒驳（refudiate）”，虽然2008年竞.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French refuser, probably an alteration of Latin recusare 'to refuse', influenced by refutare 'refute'
late Middle English: perhaps from Old French refusé 'refused', past participle of refuser (see refuse)

entry.def: If you refuse to do something, you deliberately do not do it, or you say firmly that you will not do it.

example.ex: He refused to comment after the trial...
example.tran: 庭审之后他拒绝作出评论。

example.ex: He expects me to stay on here and I can hardly refuse.
example.tran: 他希望我继续留在这里，我很难拒绝。

entry.def: If someone refuses you something, they do not give it to you or do not allow you to have it.

example.ex: The United States has refused him a visa...
example.tran: 美国拒绝给他发放签证。

example.ex: She was refused access to her children...
example.tran: 她被禁止探视她的孩子。

entry.def: If you refuse something that is offered to you, you do not accept it.

example.ex: He offered me a second drink which I refused...
example.tran: 他请我再喝一杯，我没有接受。

example.ex: The patient has the right to refuse treatment.
example.tran: 病人有权利拒绝接受治疗。

entry.tran: 废物，垃圾（主要用于官方语言）
entry.def: Refuse consists of the rubbish and all the things that are not wanted in a house, shop, or factory, and that are regularly thrown away; used mainly in official language.

example.ex: The District Council made a weekly collection of refuse.
example.tran: 区政务委员会每周收取一次垃圾。

means.word_mean: 1. food that is discarded (as from a kitchen)

sentences.sentence: "he declined to join the group on a hike"

means.word_mean: 3. elude, especially in a baffling way;
5. resist immunologically the introduction of some foreign tissue or organ;

sentences.sentence: "His body rejected the liver of the donor"
"Black people were often rejected by country clubs"

auth_sentence.content: I adamantly refuse to pursue this exchange any further!
auth_sentence.res_content: I adamantly refuse to pursue this exchange any further!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I adamantly refuse to pursue this exchange any further!

auth_sentence.content: Yet our brains simply refuse to accept this fact.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet our brains simply refuse to accept this fact.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet our brains simply refuse to accept this fact.

auth_sentence.content: We have the choice but refuse to make it.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have the choice but refuse to make it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have the choice but refuse to make it.

Sentence.sentence: Worst of all, when her son, Ned, fell and injured his knee, she refused to pay for a doctor and spent hours looking for free medical help.
The supervisor of personnel refused the request.
An X-rays technician is refusing to do her job until the firm agrees to replace its out-dated equipment.
Why he refused to answer her call.
I'm afraid to refuse to work, but I'm more afraid to expose my unborn child to the radiation.
Workers have the legal rights to refuse certain unsafe work assignments under two federal laws: the Occupational Safety and Health Act and the National Labor Relations Act

sentences.en: We asked him to come, but he refused.
sentences.cn: 我们叫他来, 可是他拒绝了。

sentences.en: It never occurred to me that he would refuse.
I think he won't refuse me.
He refused to change his mind.
My legs refused to carry me further.
The plane absolutely refused to start.
sentences.cn: 这架飞机完全发动不起来。

sentences.en: The bank refused him the loan.
I wouldn't refuse help to an old friend.
sentences.cn: 我不会拒绝给予老朋友帮助。

sentences.en: Refuse is collected twice a week.

jushi.english: We asked him to come, but he refused.
jushi.chinese: 我们叫他来,可是他拒绝了。

jushi.english: He cannot refuse if you ask politely.
jushi.chinese: 如果你客气一点的话,他是不会拒绝的。

jushi.english: He asked her to marry him but she refused.
jushi.chinese: 他向她求婚,但她拒绝了。
